extensionDescription.message: Check the last time a page was archived in the Wayback Machine.

UrlValidationFailed.description: Text telling the user that the page was not archived as its URL failed validation.

ApiRequestFailed.description: Text telling the user that the request to Wayback Machine API has failed.

ApiPageNotArchived.description: Text telling the user that a page has not been archived by the Wayback Machine.
